text: TRAILERS by July 10, 2025Source: YouTube "Worst case scenario, you two can just be my decoys." "Can I kill her?" ⚔ Well Go USA has revealed an official trailer for Baby Assassins 3, the next sequel in the Japanese Baby Assassins action comedy series. The first one arrived back in 2022, the second one dropped last year, and this third one is out on VOD next month. Teenage assassins Chisato & Mahiro visit the coastal city of Miyazaki where they unexpectedly cross paths with a bloodthirsty assassin who's looking to add to his personal body count. Baby Assassins 3, also titled Baby Assassins: Nice Days, brings back Akari Takaishi and the rising star + Snake Eyes / Rurouni Kenshin franchise stuntwoman Saori Izawa as the two leads - who are always battling someone. This time they encounter another female assassin. The cast includes Sôsuke Ikematsu, Atsuko Maeda, Atomu Mizuishi, Tomo Nakai, Tsubasa Tobinaga, Mondo Otani, Kaibashira, Karuma, and Mr. Bunny. Early reviews are saying this might be the best one yet! All the action looks badass in this trailer. Slice it up. Here's the official US trailer (+ poster) for Sakamoto Yugo's Baby Assassins 3, direct from YouTube: We’ve seen them fight, we've seen them chill, but in Baby Assassins 3, we see Chisato and Mahiro (Akari Takaishi and Saori Izawa) at the apex of their skills as they take on a brutally nihilist freelance killer who aims to take their place atop the assassin food chain. Baby Assassin series director Sakamoto Yugo and his action director Sonomura Kensuke are back yet again with the most exciting and dangerous chapter in the Baby Assassins saga to date. This time, it’s a fight for their lives. Baby Assassins 3, also known as ベイビーわるきゅーれ ナイスデイズ or Baby Assassins: Nice Days in Japanese, is once again written and directed by Japanese filmmaker Yugo Sakamoto, director of the other two Baby Assassin movies, plus Hangman's Knot, Slaughtr Jap, A Janitor, Yellow Dragon's Village, Kunioka, and Green Bullet previously. With action direction by Kensuke Sonomura. This originally opened in Japan in September 2024, and it also premiered at the 2024 New York Asian Film Festival & Fantasia in Montreal. Well Go USA will debut Sakamoto's Baby Assassins 3 sequel on VOD / Blu-ray starting August 26th, 2025 coming soon. Anyone want to watch it? TRAILERS

by
July 10, 2025
Source: YouTube

"Worst case scenario, you two can just be my decoys." "Can I kill her?" ⚔ Well Go USA has revealed an official trailer for Baby Assassins 3, the next sequel in the Japanese Baby Assassins action comedy series. The first one arrived back in 2022, the second one dropped last year, and this third one is out on VOD next month. Teenage assassins Chisato & Mahiro visit the coastal city of Miyazaki where they unexpectedly cross paths with a bloodthirsty assassin who's looking to add to his personal body count. Baby Assassins 3, also titled Baby Assassins: Nice Days, brings back Akari Takaishi and the rising star + Snake Eyes / Rurouni Kenshin franchise stuntwoman Saori Izawa as the two leads - who are always battling someone. This time they encounter another female assassin. The cast includes Sôsuke Ikematsu, Atsuko Maeda, Atomu Mizuishi, Tomo Nakai, Tsubasa Tobinaga, Mondo Otani, Kaibashira, Karuma, and Mr. Bunny. Early reviews are saying this might be the best one yet! All the action looks badass in this trailer. Slice it up.

Here's the official US trailer (+ poster) for Sakamoto Yugo's Baby Assassins 3, direct from YouTube:

We’ve seen them fight, we've seen them chill, but in Baby Assassins 3, we see Chisato and Mahiro (Akari Takaishi and Saori Izawa) at the apex of their skills as they take on a brutally nihilist freelance killer who aims to take their place atop the assassin food chain. Baby Assassin series director Sakamoto Yugo and his action director Sonomura Kensuke are back yet again with the most exciting and dangerous chapter in the Baby Assassins saga to date. This time, it’s a fight for their lives. Baby Assassins 3, also known as ベイビーわるきゅーれ ナイスデイズ or Baby Assassins: Nice Days in Japanese, is once again written and directed by Japanese filmmaker Yugo Sakamoto, director of the other two Baby Assassin movies, plus Hangman's Knot, Slaughtr Jap, A Janitor, Yellow Dragon's Village, Kunioka, and Green Bullet previously. With action direction by Kensuke Sonomura. This originally opened in Japan in September 2024, and it also premiered at the 2024 New York Asian Film Festival & Fantasia in Montreal. Well Go USA will debut Sakamoto's Baby Assassins 3 sequel on VOD / Blu-ray starting August 26th, 2025 coming soon. Anyone want to watch it?
